summary: This document is a brief email chain from November 2019 discussing a New York Post article about Epstein's jail guards being offered a plea deal. The correspondence suggests the source of the information may be a union.

events.title: NY Post Article on Epstein Jail Guards
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article headlined 'Epstein jail guards had been offered plea deal but declined.'

keyFacts: An email chain from November 2019 discusses a New York Post article about Epstein's jail guards.
The article reported that Epstein's jail guards had been offered a plea deal but declined it.
One participant in the email chain speculates that 'the union may be the source' of the information.
The correspondence is dated shortly after Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing legal fallout.
All sender/recipient names in the email headers are redacted, shown as organizational placeholders (USANYS).
